        public void getBounds(Point3d ll,

        Return the bounding box of the given display adapter. This will typically be what the coordinate system can support.
        Parameters:
        ll - Lower left corner of the bounding box.
        ur - Upper right corner of bounding box.

      • getCoordSystem

        public CoordSystem getCoordSystem()
        The coordinate system we're using for local coordinates. Display coordinates are a scaled version of that in 2D and spherical for the globe.
